etomica.integrator

Class IntegratorAnalytic

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.integrator.Integrator
      • etomica.integrator.IntegratorBox
        • etomica.integrator.IntegratorMD
          • etomica.integrator.IntegratorAnalytic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoxListener, IIntegrator

    public class IntegratorAnalytic
extends IntegratorMD
    Integrator that generates atom trajectories from an analytic formula. Takes an IntegratorAnalytic.AtomAction instance and performs action on all atoms in each time step; intention is for the action to set the position of the atom for the current time (but it could do anything).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IntegratorAnalytic.AtomTimeAction
      Extends AtomAction class to add a method to set the time.
